articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits National Defence University
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits National Defence University
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the National Defence University.
					 He paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the university.
					
					 Watching the statues of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he said  with deep emotion that the university is associated with the exploits they performed by tirelessly working heart and soul for developing the Juche-oriented national defence industry in the whole period of their revolutionary careers.
					
					 He said that the statues of the great leaders were erected at the university on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of Kim Il Sung's visit to it, adding that this was a great event of weighty significance in adding eternal shine to the immortal revolutionary exploits of the great leaders recorded in the history of education in the Juche-oriented national defence science and constituted an immense pride and happiness of all teaching staff and students of the university and personnel in the field of the national defence industry.
					
					 He went round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and room dedicated to the history of the university.
					
					 Kim Il Sung proclaimed the founding of the National Defence College, the predecessor of the National Defence University, in October, 1964 and visited it several times and took meticulous care of it including the establishment of departments, students' uniform, cap-badge and collar badge and clearly indicated the road to be followed by it.
					
					 Kim Jong Il took a measure to newly build the university in an excellent place and led it with loving care so that it could fulfill its mission and duty as a center for training national defence scientific and technical personnel.
					
					 Watching historic data, Kim Jong Un said that the university has developed into the highest seat of training Juche-oriented national defence scientific and technical personnel having hundreds of persons with academic degrees and titles, several colleges and faculties and a doctorial institute, etc.
					
					 Looking at photos on the board introducing heroes one by one, he said that there are many acquaintances at the university, a clear proof that it has covered a proud path following the party. The university has produced a lot of personnel who have protected our party, he added.
					
					 He went round various places of the university including an exhibition hall of education science, e-library and weaponry hall, etc. to learn in detail about the teaching and education and scientific research.
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be fulfilled by the university.
					
					 Noting that the National Defence University is one of the universities for which he has the deepest affection and to which he attaches importance, he said he would frequently receive reports on the problems arising in the teaching and education at the university and personally settle them. He promised to turn the university into the most prestigious one in the country and an iconic university training hardcore personnel and talents who would shoulder upon themselves the national defence science and the world first class one.
					
					 He had a photo session with the officials and teachers of the university.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Man Gon, vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, Yu Jin and Jo Yong Won, vice-department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Party Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Party Delegation
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with a delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) headed by Sounthon Sayachak, member of the Central Committee of the LPRP and chairwoman of the Committee for External Affairs of the C.C., LPRP, which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of St. Lucia
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of St. Lucia
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Sunday sent a congratulatory message to Allen Chastanet upon his election as prime minister of St. Lucia.
					 The message wished him success in his responsible work, expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Plenary Meeting of KSDP Supports Line and Policies for National Reunification
articles.content:
Plenary Meeting of KSDP Supports Line and Policies for National Reunification
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party (KSDP) held its plenary meeting in Pyongyang on Monday.
					 Present there were members and alternate members of the Central Committee of the KSDP and deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly from the KSDP.
					
					 They discussed measures to carry out the Juche-oriented line and policies for national reunification Marshal Kim Jong Un laid down at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the KSDP, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the Juche-oriented line and policies on ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula, reunifying the country by federal formula and radically improving the inter-Korean relations under the uplifted banner of national independence and great national unity clarified by Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the WPK are the most fair and aboveboard great programme for national reunification and patriotic banner.
					
					 Expressing belief that the country would certainly be reunified in the near future when the Koreans work hard for it in line with the line and policies for national reunification advanced by Kim Jong Un, they declared the KSDP and all party members fully support the line and policies and will take the lead in the struggle to implement them.
					
					 The DPRK government, political parties and organizations at their  joint conference discussed a measure for opening a broad avenue to national reunification and sent an appeal to all the Koreans, proposing to open a nationwide great meeting for reunification on the occasion of the 71st anniversary of the liberation of the country, they noted, adding that this was a crucial proposal of great significance in deescalating the present tension on the Korean peninsula and giving the inter-Korean relations a fresh start.
					
					 They called on all Koreans truly desirous of the peace and reunification of the peninsula including representatives and prominent figures from the authorities, political parties and organizations from the north and the south to make positive efforts to bring the great national meeting to success.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not groundlessly turn down the patriotic and constructive proposal of the DPRK but respond to the offer for settling the national issue and the issue of national reunification from an honest and sincere stance, they held. 
					
					 The plenary meeting decided to send letters to the political parties of south Korea, calling for opening a broad avenue to independent reunification through great national unity.

articles.title: Taekwon-Do Delegation Here
articles.content:
Taekwon-Do Delegation Here
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A Taekwon-Do delegation headed by Leong Wai Meng, vice-president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation, arrived here on Monday to attend the celebrations of the 50th founding anniversary of the ITF.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A Taekwon-Do delegation visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday upon its arrival here to attend the celebrations of the 50th founding anniversary of the International TaekwonÔºçDo Federation.
					 The members of the delegation laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Lao Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Lao Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) headed by Sounthon Sayachak, member of the Central Committee of the LPRP and chairwoman of the Committee for External Affairs of its Central Committee, Monday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Members of the delegation laid a bouquet at the old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 The guests looked round the historical relics preserved with much care, being briefed on the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung associated with the old home and the patriotic careers of his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 The delegation toured the Museum of Weapons and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, Sci-Tech Complex, Rungna People's Pleasure Park and other places.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Lao Party Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Lao Party Delegation
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Sounthon Sayachak, member of the Central Committee of the LPRP and chairwoman of the Committee for External Affairs of its Central Committee who is leading the delegation, on Monday.

articles.title: Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Supports New Line and Policies for National Reunification
articles.content:
Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Supports New Line and Policies for National Reunification
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), was interviewed by KCNA on Monday on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The chief said June 15 is a meaningful day which gave a bright prospect for reunification to the Korean nation.
					
					 The people in the south are recollecting with profound yearning the revolutionary career of leader Kim Jong Il, who provided a firm foundation for independent reunification, peace and prosperity, on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration, the chief noted, and went on:
					
					 The whole life of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il is characterized by the history of dedication as a peerless patriot who laid an eternal foundation for national reunification.
					
					 The exploits he performed by wisely leading the reunification movement with his outstanding idea and extraordinary leadership will shine forever together with the eternal history of the nation.
					
					 The respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is steering the reunification movement.
					
					 He, who takes to heart more than anyone else the suffering and misfortune all Koreans are undergoing due to the national division, clarified a new line and policies for national reunification to weather difficulties and indicated overall ways for implementing them at the podium of the historic 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 This is the great and courageous decision that can be made only by the lodestar of reunification and the great sage of the nation who takes care of all the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Every Korean should wholeheartedly remain true to the line and policies for national reunification laid down by the peerlessly great man out of ardent patriotism.
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the AINDF will devotedly work to build a prosperous reunified power in Korea without fail full of conviction and optimism about sure victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Opens
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Opens
Phyongsong, June 13 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize opened with due ceremony at the Phyongsong Stadium in South Phyongan Province on Monday.
					 Players will compete in over ten events including football, basketball, volleyball and table-tennis in Phyongsong, Sariwon, Hamhung, etc.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials concerned, sports persons and working people and schoolchildren in Phyongsong City. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there took place a women's football match between South Phyongan Province and Jagang Province.

articles.title: Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital, Representation of Loving Care for People's Health
articles.content:
Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital, Representation of Loving Care for People's Health
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital is now under construction in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, thanks to the health policy of the Workers' Party of Korea for the improvement of people's health.
					 In the DPRK, the Party and the State bear full responsibility and take care of the people's health.
					
					 In recent years alone, such up-to-date healthcare facilities were built in the country as the Okryu Children's Hospital and Ryugyong Dental Hospital.
					
					 These facilities are a result of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's deep care for the improvement of people's health.
					
					 He personally initiated the construction of those hospitals and wisely led it ranging from their design to completion.
					
					 When visiting the Okryu Children's Hospital under construction in July Juche 102 (2013), the supreme leader even learned about the size of a sickroom and settled all problems arising in operating the hospital. He again visited the hospital in October that year and named it "Okryu Children's Hospital". 
					
					 He also gave field guidance to the Ryugyong Dental Hospital under construction in September 2013 and took steps to complete its construction on the highest level.
					
					 In March 2014, he toured the hospital under operation and called upon its medical workers to give sincere health service to the people. Then he dropped in at the Okryu Children's Hospital to solve the problems arising in its management, stressing that the hospital is entirely for the sake of children's health.
					
					 The people in the DPRK are now enjoying benefits from the advantageous free healthcare system under the loving care of Kim Jong Un for them.

articles.title: Promising Girl Footballer
articles.content:
Promising Girl Footballer
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team proved successful at the AFC U-14 Girls' Regional Championship 2016 for East Zone.
					 Most of its players are from the Pyongyang International Football School.
					
					 Among them is Won Hyang Son, a main striker who came under focus of experts for kicking 15 goals (3 goals per match on an average) out of 54 goals the team scored during the championship and thus won the prizes of the most valuable player and the top goal scorer of the championship.
					
					 According to Jang Kyong Il, head coach of the team, Won is quick in movements and good in dribbling.
					
					 Born in Phyongsong City, she began to learn football in her primary school days and rose to fame at the national games of juvenile sports schools.
					
					 She was enrolled at Pyongyang International Football School three years ago.

articles.title: KCNA Slams U.S. Anachronistic Policy of Strength
articles.content:
KCNA Slams U.S. Anachronistic Policy of Strength
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is getting ever more frantic in its moves to develop ultra-modern weapons despite the opposition and rebuff by the international community.
					 The U.S. recently opened to public the test of new electromagnetic-orbit gun (Electromagnetic Railgun) in the wake of its long-diving test of the double-mode submarine not long ago.
					
					 Electromagnetic Railgun which fires a shell without powder explosion by using the character of the electromagnetic field was developed by the U.S. Navy with an investment of hundreds of millions of dollars. It is a weapon of mass destruction as it is called a "weapon capable of intercepting missiles of China and Russia" in the territory of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. frantic development of the above-said weapons amid global nuclear arms race is a revelation of its anachronistic policy of strength to contain its major rivals with an unchallenged military edge and prevent its position as a "superpower" from sinking.
					
					 It is long since the position of the U.S. as the "only superpower in the world" sank owing to its criminal moves for world domination.
					
					 When the U.S. was saddled with huge national debt and in the grip of the crisis caused by economic slump due to its reckless "anti-terrorism war" and moves for establishing the system of unipolar domination, the Asia-Pacific region rapidly emerged a hub of world development in the 21st century.
					
					 The U.S. should have given up its ambition for domination which is precipitating its doom.
					
					 However, it is foolishly trying to contain China making rapid economic growth in Asia and Russia which recovered the position as a power and to dominate the Asia-Pacific region, far from drawing a lesson from its difficult position, blinded by its scenario for world domination.
					
					 Against this backdrop the U.S. came out with the pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy in which it adopted large-scale arms build-up in the region as its policy. It is part of its scenario for carrying out this strategy to step up the development of ultra-modern weapons while modernizing nuclear weapons.
					
					 This is clearly proved by the fact that on Feb. 25 the U.S. deputy secretary of Defense blustered that in the wake of test-fire of ICBM Minuteman 3, it was aimed to send a message that the weapon is capable of making a nuclear strike at big powers in the Asia-Pacific region, and U.S. reptile media are billing the electromagnetic-orbit gun as a "weapon of dream" for containing Russia and China.
					
					 It is as clear as pikestaff that the arms race and political and military tension are bound to escalate in the Asia-Pacific region due to the U.S. development of WMDs and arms build-up.
					
					 The U.S. policy of strength remains unchanged. Consequently, the moves for multi-polarization against it are sure to be stepped up.
					
					 It is self-evident that the U.S. ridiculous policy of strength can never help realize its "dream" of conquering the world.
					
					 The U.S. anachronistic strategy for domination is bound to go bust.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Ruling Forces for Tightening Military Nexus with Outsiders
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Ruling Forces for Tightening Military Nexus with Outsiders
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- There took place recently military authorities' talks among south Korea, the U.S. and Japan in Singapore. Han Min Gu, puppet minister of Defense of south Korea, agreed with his U.S. and Japanese masters to further the "thorough-going enforcement of sanctions against the north and close cooperation for forcing the north to dismantle nuclear program," branding the DPRK's measure for strengthening its nuclear deterrence as "violation of resolution on sanctions." Meanwhile, they also discussed expanding the "sharing of military information about the north" with the upcoming U.S.-Japan-south Korea joint ballistic missile defense exercise as an occasion, vociferating about the "need for cooperation to cope with nuclear and missile threats from the north."
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is the dangerous military conspiracy between the masters and servant and a traitorous act to hurt the fellow countrymen in the north in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 This clearly revealed once again the despicable nature of the south Korean puppet ruling quarters running amuck with the north-south confrontation and the moves to ignite a war against the north, while clinging to the coattails of outsiders with their backs turned on the nation.
					
					 The U.S. is going to encircle the DPRK with Japan and south Korea as shock brigades and escalate political and military pressure and "sanctions" on the DPRK and thus realize the ambition for invading it. This strategy of the U.S. still remains unchanged. However, the south Korean ruling quarters, poor colonial stooges of the U.S., unhesitatingly are tightening military nexus with the Japanese reactionaries, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, dancing to the tune of the U.S.
					
					 The above-said military authorities' talks among the U.S., Japan and south Korea were the dangerous provocation to cook up as early as possible the triangular military alliance aiming at the invasion of the north under the control of the U.S.
					
					 The road for improving the inter-Korean relations is blocked and the danger of the outbreak of a nuclear war increases on the Korean peninsula on a daily basis due to such traitors and confrontational maniacs.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Regime Is Bound to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Regime Is Bound to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean ruling forces are working hard to prolong their dirty remaining days, while seeking to gratify their greed for power and live in luxury and comfort and currying favor with outsiders in disregard of the destiny of the country, nation and people says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The successive dictators of south Korea took the road of treachery but no group of traitors is as hideous as the present conservative ruling forces who committed unspeakable crimes before the nation.
					
					 No sooner had the chief executive taken power than she cried out for "great unity of people" and "politics of understanding and concord" but the traitor's bad habit of not seeking people's understanding escalated only social conflict and confusion.
					
					 It is a unanimous view of the south Korean media that the remaining days of the present chief executive incompetent in politics and only keen on war would become more miserable.
					
					 The south Korean people's astonishment and resentment against the chief executive have reached the extremes as she is working hard to impose nuclear disaster on the nation after pushing the inter-Korean relations to the worst ebb through confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 She talked volumes about the "confidence-building process" and "Dresden declaration" as if she advanced something new for the inter-relations, but the south Korean people raised voices critical of them.
					
					 It is an inevitable result of her politics for confrontation that the inter-Korean relations are now at rock bottom.
					
					 It is an inevitability of history for traitors going against the desire and demand of the popular masses to meet ruin.

articles.title: Scandals Rife in S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Scandals Rife in S. Korean Puppet Army
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Endless scandals are reported from the south Korean puppet army, sparking a great uproar.
					 A survey made by an inspector laid bare the scandal committed by the Ministry of Defense by using golf courses. 
					
					 The right to manage and operate the golf courses built by the ministry in 32 areas of south Korea are entirely in the hands of generals or ex-high-ranking officers. 
					
					 Golf courses were built allegedly for the purpose of service members' physical training and their welfare but just 14 percent of them are actually used by those on the active list. Some military bosses are raking up huge profits from golf courses.
					
					 It was also disclosed that the puppet Defence Agency perpetrated a scam in the course of purchasing sleeping bags for the army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 8 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il started his work at the C.C., the WPK on June 19, Juche 53 (1964).
					
					 This marked a historic event of special significance in accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 He faithfully assisted President Kim Il Sung in leading the party, state and army.
					
					 The DPRK registered brilliant successes in all spheres including politics, economy and military affairs thanks to his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and energetic leadership.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un has successfully carried forward the party-building idea and exploits of Kim Jong Il and thus further developed the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He provided a firm guarantee for victoriously accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution through generations.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Myanmar Figure
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Myanmar Figure
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, issued a statement on June 8 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 He said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il provided a firm foundation for accomplishing the cause of reunifying Korea, upholding the behest of President Kim Il Sung for national reunification.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is a lodestar of Korea's reunification who led to the road of victory and glory the Korean people's struggle for national unity and reunification and a peerless patriot who ushered in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 His patriotic intention and desire are being successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 At the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong Un set forth it as the polices for national reunification to achieve national independence and great unity, ensure peace and realize the reunification by federal formula as was advanced by the preceding leaders.
					
					 Though obstacles and difficulties may lie on the road of national reunification, Kim Jong Un has firm will and faith to achieve the national reunification, lifelong desire of the preceding leaders and greatest desire of the nation, at any cost.
					
					 Expressing belief that the Korean people will certainly usher in a new era of independent reunification under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, the statement extended firm support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Unethical Acts Denounced Abroad
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Unethical Acts Denounced Abroad
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Bodies in Nigeria and Benin released statements on June 8 in denunciation of the south Korean regime's group allurement and abduction of DPRK's citizens.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism disclosed in a statement that the south Korean regime kidnapped a group of the DPRK's citizens and is resorting to all sorts of mean acts such as appeasement, deception, threat and blackmail on the abductees. 
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The said group abduction is an international terror that can never be justified and a wanton violation of the DPRK's dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 But the south Korean authorities are distorting the truth about it and making such sophism as "distortion of fact" and "voluntary defection from the north".
					
					 They should apologize for their acts against humanity at an early date and send the abductees back.
					
					 And as was required by the families of the victims, they should immediately take practical measures to let them meet their daughters in person in Seoul and take them home.
					
					 The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Beninese National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement strongly demanded the south Korean authorities send the abductees back at once, condemning the said kidnapping as a heinous terrorist act planned and organized by them.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Day Marked Mexico, Malaysia
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Day Marked Mexico, Malaysia
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting and Korean photo, book and art exhibition in Mexico and round-table talks in Malaysia on June 6 and 7 to celebrate the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venue were photos showing the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, publications introducing Juche Korea emerging always victorious under the leadership of the great party and art pieces showing the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK founded by the President into the ever-victorious iron-willed party and creditably protected the country's sovereignty and the socialist cause while foiling the vicious moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 They noted that Kim Jong Un led to victory the Korean people's struggle for building a socialist power while staunchly beating back the hostile forces' more undisguised moves to invade the DPRK by dint of Songun.
					
					 The chief in charge of the external affairs of the United Malays National Organization of Malaysia praised Kim Jong Il as the great statesman who consolidated the WPK into a powerful one.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Universidad de Defensa Nacional
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Universidad de Defensa Nacional
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Universidad de Defensa Nacional.
					El Mariscal rindio homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de bronce levantadas en el plantel docente.
					
					Mirando las estatuas de bronce de los grandes lideres con imagenes sonrientes, el dijo con emocion que tambien en la universidad estan impregnadas cordialmente las proezas de ellos quienes dedicaron ingentes esfuerzos durante todas sus vidas revolucionarias para el fortalecimiento de la autoctona industria de defensa nacional.
					
					Apunto que el levantamiento de las estatuas de bronce del Presidente y el Dirigente con motivo del aniversario 49 de la visita del Presidente a la universidad, deviene un gran jubilo de gran significado para hacer brillar las proezas de los Lideres acumuladas en la historia pedagogica de ciencias de defensa nacional, y constituye la gloria y felicidad de todos los profesores, empleados y cadetes de la universidad y de los empleados de la industria de defensa nacional.
					
					El Mariscal recorrio la sala de educacion revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial.
					
					Recordo que el Presidente declaro en octubre de 1964 la fundacion del Instituto Superior de Defensa Nacional, predecesor de la universidad en cuestion, y lo visito en varias ocasiones prestando preciosa atencion a la composicion de las facultades y al uniforme, distintivo para la gorra e insignia de los cadetes, asi que dirigio claramente el camino a seguir por el centro docente.
					
					El Dirigente tomo medidas para construir nuevamente la universidad en un sitio magnifico e hizo que esta cumpliera su obligacion y mision como base de formacion de personajes de ciencias y tecnicas de defensa nacional.
					
					Viendo los datos exhibidos, el Mariscal dijo que bajo la direccion y cuidado del Partido y Lideres, la universidad se desarrollo como plantel supremo de la formacion de personajes de ciencias y tecnicas de defensa nacional que tiene cientos de personas con grado academico o categoria docente y varios institutos superiores, facultades e instituto doctoral.
					
					El Mariscal detuvo su paso ante la pantalla de presentacion de heroes y miro una tras otra las fotos de los heroes diciendo que alli se veian muchas personas con caras familiares, lo que le facilita conocer bien que la universidad registro un trayecto orgulloso junto con el partido y agrego que este centro docente formo a muchas personas quienes defendieron nuestro partido.
					
					Pasando revista a varios puntos de la universidad inclusive la exposicion de ciencias pedagogicas, la biblioteca electronica y la sala de armas, el averiguo en detalles el estado de la ensenanza pedagogica e investigacion cientifica.
					
					El Mariscal dio las tareas asumidas ante el plantel docente.
					
					Enfatizo que la Universidad de Defensa Nacional es una de las que el mismo da importancia con mayor afecto y agrego que resolveria los problemas pendientes en la ensenanza y educacion de la universidad y la convertiria en el centro docente con mayor capacidad en el pais y el de primera categoria de talla mundial capaz de formar a los talentosos medulares de ciencias de defensa nacional.
					
					El Mariscal tomo fotos de recuerdo junto con los funcionarios y profesores de la universidad.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, Ri Man Gon, y los subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Yu Jin y Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de PPRL
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de PPRL
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio el dia 13 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae en un ambiente amistoso con la delegacion del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao encabezada por Sounthon Sayachak, miembro del Comite Central del PPRL y presidenta de la Comision de Relaciones Exteriores del CC del Partido, que le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju felicita a su homologo de Saint Lucia
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju felicita a su homologo de Saint Lucia
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, envio el dia 12 un mensaje de felicitacion a Allen Chastanet, electo premier de Saint Lucia.
					En su misiva, Pak expreso su conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas en el futuro y le deseo exitos en su trabajo responsable.

articles.title: En Pyongyang delegacion de Taekwondo
articles.content:
En Pyongyang delegacion de Taekwondo
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- La delegacion de Taekwondo dirigida por Leong Wai Meng, vicepresidente de la Federacion Internacional de Taekwondo (ITF en ingles), arribo el dia 13 a esta capital para tomar parte en el acto conmemorativo por el 50o aniversario de la fundacion de la ITF.

articles.title: Efectuada sesion plenaria de CC de PSDC
articles.content:
Efectuada sesion plenaria de CC de PSDC
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 13 en esta capital la sesion plenaria del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea (PSDC) con la participacion de los miembros y miembros suplentes del CC del Partido y los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema por el mismo partido. 
					El foro discutio las medidas para materializar cabalmente la autoctona linea y orientacion por la reunificacion de la patria, presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					El presidente del CC del PSDC, Kim Yong Dae, presento el informe y hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el Mariscal presento en el VII Congreso del PTC la autoctona linea y orientacion de preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana bajo la bandera de la independencia nacional y la gran unidad nacional, realizar la reunificacion de la patria mediante el sistema federal y mejorar radicalmente las relaciones intercoreanas, que constituyen el programa mas justo y patriotico para la reintegracion territorial. 
					
					Afirmaron que si se materializan la linea y orientacion presentadas por el Mariscal, se lograra en un futuro cercano la reunificacion de Corea, y enfatizaron que el PSDC y sus militantes las apoyan totalmente y estaran al frente de la lucha por su materializacion. 
					
					La conferencia conjunta del gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea discutio las medidas para abrir el ancho camino por la reunificacion de la patria y emitio un llamamiento a toda la nacion coreana proponiendo efectuar el gran acto nacional por la reunificacion con motivo del 71o aniversario de la  liberacion de la patria, subrayaron y lo calificaron de importante propuesta para aliviar la peor situacion actual de la Peninsula Coreana y mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Enfatizaron que los representantes de las autoridades, partidos politicos y entidades y las personalidades celebres y otras personas de ambas partes coreanas que desean de veras la paz y la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana deben hacer esfuerzos por la marcha exitosa del acto nacional por la reunificacion. 
					
					Demandaron a las autoridades surcoreanas a no negar sin ton ni son la propuesta patriotica y constructiva de la parte Norte sino tomar la posicion sincera y seria para resolver el problema nacional y el de reunificacion. 
					
					La sesion plenaria decidio enviar a los partidos politicos surcoreanos una carta para exhortarles a abrir el ancho camino por la reunificacion independiente mediante la gran unidad nacional.

articles.title: ACNC critica anacronica politica de fuerza de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC critica anacronica politica de fuerza de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- A pesar de la oposicion y el repudio de la sociedad internacional, Estados Unidos  recurre mas al desarrollo de las armas de punta.
					Hace poco, realizo la prueba de buceo continuo durante largo tiempo de submarino del doble modo e hizo publico al mundo la escena del ensayo del lanzamiento de Electromagnetic Railgun.
					
					Esta arma, desarrollada a costa de cientos de millones de dolares por las fuerzas navales norteamericanas y otros, lanza el proyectil sin ayuda de la explosion de polvora usando la caracteristica del campo electromagnetico.
					
					Por esta razon, esta arma de exterminio masivo se llama "arma capaz de interceptar tambien los misiles de China y Rusia" en el interior de EE.UU.
					
					El hecho de que EE.UU. lanzo Electromagnetic Railgun y se entrega al desarrollo de las armas de nuevo tipo gastando enorme dinero causando la carrera armamentista nuclear en el mundo, demuestra la anacronica politica de fuerza tendente a controlar los rivales principales con la superioridad militar absoluta y mantener la "posicion de superpotencia" que va derribandose.
					
					La posicion de EE.UU. que se autodenominaba como "unica superpotencia" se rebajo ya hace mucho tiempo a causa de las criminales maniobras por tomar la heguemonia mundial.
					
					Cuando EE.UU. se desespera en medio de la crisis de la enorme deuda estatal y la declinacion economica debido a la imprudente "guerra antiterrorista" y las maniobras tendentes a establecer el sistema de dominio unipolar, la region de Asia-Pacifico emergieron rapidamente como centro del desarrollo del mundo del siglo XXI.
					
					EE.UU. tuviera que abandonar merecidamente la ambicion dominacionista que acelera la derrota.
					
					Pero EE.UU., enloquecido por la heguemonia mundial, intenta absurdamente para controlar a China que se desarrolla en lo economico en Asia, y a Rusia que rescato la posicion de potencia y dominar la region de Asia-Pacifico lejos de sacar la leccion en su situacion tenebrosa.
					
					Bajo tales circunstancias nacio la estrategia de dar importancia a Asia-Pacifico que politizo el aumento de las fuerzas armadas de gran tamano en esta zona.
					
					El desarrollo de armas de punta que EE.UU. acelera junto con la modernizacion de armas nucleares, deviene un eslabon de las maniobras por realizar dicha estrategia de dominacion.
					
					Lo comprueban evidentemente el hecho de que despues de realizar el lanzamiento de ensayo del misil balistico intercontinental, Minuteman 3, el 25 de febrero, el subsecretario de Defensa norteamericana dijo que eso era para dar senal de la posibilidad de ataque nuclear a las potencias de la zona de Asia-Pacifico y el otro de que los medios venales de EE.UU. califican Electromagnetic Railgun de "arma de sueno" para reprimir a Rusia y China.
					
					Es claro que debido a las maniobras del desarrollo de armas y el aumento de las fuerzas armadas de caracter agresivo de EE.UU., se agravara mas la carrera armamentista y la tension politico-militar en la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Es invariable tanto ayer como hoy la politica de fuerza de EE.UU., razon por la cual se activaran los movimientos por la multipolarizacion del mundo contra ella.
					
					La ridicula politica de fuerza de EE.UU. no puede realizar el "sueno" de la conquista del mundo, lo cual es la clara razon.
					
					La anacronica estrategia de dominacion de EE.UU. no evitara el fracaso.
